promptTemplate: Low-quality surveillance video style, black and white, {night_vision} in night vision mode, high contrast, rough film texture. Fixed perspective: {lens_type} lens (simulating real cat's eye perspective), peeking from behind the interior door. The light is dim, and the {scene_location} is shrouded in darkness. A huge {main_animal} walks slowly and majestically towards the door with heavy steps. Walking with the {main_animal} is a {companion_animal}. They walk to the door in unison. When they stop in front of the door, the {companion_animal}'s eyes turn to the cat's eye lens (lens position). {action_type}. The {main_animal} is expressionless and indifferent to the {companion_animal}'s behavior. Due to the cat's eye perspective, the edges of the picture are slightly dark. It is quiet all around, with only the faint chirping of insects in the distance.

action_type.label: Action Type
action_type.default: Like a human, the small animal raises one front paw provocatively, deliberately straightening only the longest middle finger

options.value: Like a human, the small animal raises one front paw provocatively, deliberately straightening only the longest middle finger, while all other fingers are tightly bent and retracted, forming a clear and precise movement, imitating the insulting 'middle finger' gesture of humans. The shape of the paw imitates the human hand. The movement is slow and full of irony, and it remains in this position after completion, with eyes penetrating the lens and looking directly at the viewer
